name: setup-dart
description: The setup-dart GitHub Action - download and setup the Dart SDK.

scripts.build: dart compile js -olib/main.js -O2 lib/main.dart && dart tool/sig.dart --generate
scripts.dist: ncc build lib/main.mjs && cp lib/main.js dist/main.cjs && cp lib/sig.txt dist/sig.txt
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run dist
